creator: cameramanpv@cameramanpv.net
text:
Will this work with windowsME?
If it does what is the direct link to download it?
I want to run perl so what elce do I have to download and in what order?
I will have no internet for the summer so I need to be able to run perl cgi 
programs on my computer.

Thank you very much,
Aaron

PS I use a lot of cgi perl on my web site store 
http://www.cameramanpv.net/shop/index.html

creator: erik@codefaktor.de
text:
Yes it will work and you can download the Apache 2.0.45 binaries for 
windows here: http://nagoya.apache.org/mirror/httpd/binaries/win32/

And a suitable Perl interpreter here: 
http://www.activestate.com/Products/ActivePerl/

But to be clear, this is a bug database and NOT a user support forum. 
Please try to find help in the user groups 
(http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users).

Thanks for using Apache.
